net.blitzcube.peapi.api.packet

Interface IEntityPacketFactory


  • public interface IEntityPacketFactory
    Since:
    2018-04-23
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEntityPacket createAnimationPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity, IEntityAnimationPacket.AnimationType type)
      Create an animation packet using an entity identifier and an animation type.
      IEntityPacket createClickPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity, IEntityClickPacket.ClickType type)
      Create an inbound click packet using an entity identifier.
      IEntityPacket createDataPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity)
      Create a data packet using the entity identifier.
      IEntityPacket createDestroyPacket(IEntityIdentifier... entities)
      Creates a packet that destroys all of the entites given by the entity identifiers.
      IEntityPacket createEffectAddPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier, org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect effect) 
      IEntityPacket createEffectRemovePacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier, org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType type) 
      IEntityPacket createEntitySpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier)
      Creates an entity spawn packet that will spawn an entity for a client.
      IEntityPacket[] createEquipmentPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity, org.bukkit.inventory.EntityEquipment equipment)
      Creates a set of packets that will send out a set of equipment for an entity
      IEntityPacket createEquipmentPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity, org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Creates a packet that will modify one equipment slot of an entity.
      IEntityPacket createMountPacket(IEntityIdentifier vehicle, IEntityIdentifier... passengers)
      Creates a mount packet that will update a vehicle's passengers
      IEntityPacket[] createObjectSpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier)
      Creates an object spawn packet that will spawn an object for a client.
      IEntityPacket createStatusPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity, byte status)
      Creates a packet that will update a given entity's status for a client.

    • Method Detail

      • createAnimationPacket

        IEntityPacket createAnimationPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity,
                                    IEntityAnimationPacket.AnimationType type)
        Create an animation packet using an entity identifier and an animation type.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        type - the type of animation to send
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createClickPacket

        IEntityPacket createClickPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity,
                                IEntityClickPacket.ClickType type)
        Create an inbound click packet using an entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createDataPacket

        IEntityPacket createDataPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity)
        Create a data packet using the entity identifier. Data will be pulled from the identifier by default only if the identifier targets a fake entity. Otherwise, you must modify the data manually.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createDestroyPacket

        IEntityPacket createDestroyPacket(IEntityIdentifier... entities)
        Creates a packet that destroys all of the entites given by the entity identifiers.
        Parameters:
        entities - the entities to be removed
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEquipmentPacket

        IEntityPacket[] createEquipmentPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity,
                                      org.bukkit.inventory.EntityEquipment equipment)
        Creates a set of packets that will send out a set of equipment for an entity
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        equipment - the equipment to be sent
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEquipmentPacket

        IEntityPacket createEquipmentPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity,
                                    org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot,
                                    org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Creates a packet that will modify one equipment slot of an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to modify
        slot - the slot to change
        item - the new item to put in the slot
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createMountPacket

        IEntityPacket createMountPacket(IEntityIdentifier vehicle,
                                IEntityIdentifier... passengers)
        Creates a mount packet that will update a vehicle's passengers
        Parameters:
        vehicle - the vehicle whose passengers will be set
        passengers - the passengers to put onto the vehicle
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEntitySpawnPacket

        IEntityPacket createEntitySpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier)
        Creates an entity spawn packet that will spawn an entity for a client.
        Do not use this method to spawn objects - use createObjectSpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier) instead. This one will just throw an error.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the entity to be created
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createObjectSpawnPacket

        IEntityPacket[] createObjectSpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier)
        Creates an object spawn packet that will spawn an object for a client.
        Do not use this method to spawn entities - use createEntitySpawnPacket(IEntityIdentifier) instead . This one will just throw an error.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the object to be created
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createStatusPacket

        IEntityPacket createStatusPacket(IEntityIdentifier entity,
                                 byte status)
        Creates a packet that will update a given entity's status for a client.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose status should be updated
        status - the new status to be set
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEffectAddPacket

        IEntityPacket createEffectAddPacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier,
                                    org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect effect)

      • createEffectRemovePacket

        IEntityPacket createEffectRemovePacket(IEntityIdentifier identifier,
                                       org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType type)
